Name: Kabukicho Story
About the game: The devastating war ravaged the poor village and ruined the life of its citizen. Poverty, hunger and disease forced many families to send their children to orphanages. And so this ill fate fall upon our poor girl. After leaving her native village, the girl meets a boy who lost his way in the forest. But this boy is not so simple. He is the heir to a wealthy, noble family. This meeting will be a turning point in their fate... Help the loving ones wove their fate together and find happiness. Features: * A short, exciting adventure in a fantasy world. * Gameplay with combine elements of JRPG, quest and stealth. * An emotional love story. * Two main characters. Play for both of them! * Pixel graphics. * Good music. * Simple controls (mouse + keyboard).
